extendedInfo.description: Never Forget God is a simple app that will remind us of God as we go through our daily routine. You can choose the type of reminder that will suit you to remind you of God.The following five different types of reminders can be set in Never Forget God app...- Hourly Reminder- Half-hourly Reminder- Every fifteen minutes Reminder - Twice daily Reminder- Once Daily ReminderYou can set a reminder text of your own or choose one of the divine affirmations that comes with the app.Never Forget God will help us to keep God in our thoughts constantly or on regular intervals. Enjoy HIS company :-)*** No advertisements in this app ***Kindly please rate this app and give feedback. We love your feedback/suggestions as it will help us make this app better. Feel free to email us at hollowflute108@gmail.com with your questions/suggestions/concerns regarding this app.Thank you!

reviews.title: How do I tell it to remind me daily from 0900 am to 0900 pm ?
